data.name: Movavi Video Suite 2022 - Creative Set
data.detailed_description:
Unleash your creativity! These decorative effects will inspire you to craft outstanding videos.

This set includes:
  • Brush and Paint Pack
  • Threads and Needles Pack
  • Theater Pack
  • Funky Vibes Pack

In this set, you’ll find:

  • 34 titles
  • 27 stickers
  • 14 backgrounds
  • 13 transitions
  • 3 intros

The DLC set is compatible with Movavi Video Suite 2022 Steam Edition.

fullgame.name: Movavi Video Suite 2022 Steam Edition - Video Making Software: Video Editor Plus, Screen Recorder and Video Converter Premium

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/10/11 with up-to-date patches and service packs installed
  • Processor: Intel®, AMD®, or compatible dual-core processor, 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® series 8, Intel® HD Graphics 2000, AMD Radeon™ R600 or higher graphics card with up-to-date drivers
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280 × 768 screen resolution, 32-bit color
